Package alp.core

Specifies the interfaces for and capabilities of the component and signal classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ComponentInterface A generalized component.
 

Class Summary
Component An implementation of ComponentInterface.
Design A hardware design which consists of an Component set and an Signal set.
Generic A class to store the generic map session of the components.
IComponent An intermediate component.
IOComponent An Input/Output component.
LargePort Specifies Input/Output parameters for Component and Signal.
Parameters Some Design parameters and compiler options.
Port Specifies Input/Output parameters for Component and Signal.
Signal A directed edge between Components.
 

Enum Summary
PortType Specifies Port types and attributes.
SignalType Specifies Signal types and attributes.
VHDLType Specifies Port types and attributes.
 

Package alp.core Description

Specifies the interfaces for and capabilities of the component and signal classes.
